籤詩版本二:
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, akara ule nke atọ, nke anọ na nke ise nke ọnwa mbụ na-efu efu, ọkara anọghị, ọkara ugbu a, na ezughị ezu.
Na-echere nri abalị etiti abalị n'ụbọchị iri na ise nke afọ, ihe niile na-egbuke egbuke ma juputara
詩意:
Na hexagram a, ọnwa na-efu mana o jughị.
Nwee ndidi n'ihe niile.
解曰: Nọgide na-eche nche. Dị ka ọnwa mbụ nke ọnwa. Na-eche oge okirikiri. Ọ dịghị ihe ọjọọ.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Yuan rịgoro n'ocheeze
N'ime afọ ikpeazụ nke usoro ndị eze Sui, Emperor Yang nke Sui Dynasty rụrụ arụ ma na-agbaji, na-ekpori ndụ n'ebe nile, na-akpata iwe n'etiti ndị mmadụ ma kesaa alaeze ukwu n'etiti ndị dike.
N'afọ 618 AD, Yu Wenhuaji, Sima Dekan, Pei Qantong na ndị ọzọ malitere mwepu igbu Emperor Yang nke Sui Dynasty ma kpọsaa Yang Hao dị ka eze ukwu.
N'oge na-adịghị anya Yu Wenhuaji gburu Qin Wanghao ma kpọsaa onwe ya Emperor Xu, na-eguzobe obodo Xu.
N'afọ sochirinụ, Tang general Li Shentong na Xia eze Dou Jiande kpara aka bibie ya.
Mgbe mpaghara Central Plains nụrụ banyere ọnwụ Emperor Yang, onye nche Luoyang Wang Shichong kwadoro Eze Dong nke Yue dị ka eze ukwu, ya bụ, Emperor Ai nke Sui Dynasty.
N'oge a, Li Yuan chụpụrụ Yang You, kpọsaa onwe ya eze ukwu na Taiyuan, ma gbanwee aha obodo ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Tang. Nke a bụ Tang Gaozu.
聖意: Ezinụlọ na ụlọ na-achọ onwe ha ihe ọma n'oge okpomọkụ na ụbịa, chọọ akụ na ụba, na-azụ ahịa, chere oge, alụmdi na nwunye agwụla, Liujia mụrụ nwa agbọghọ, ndị na-agafe agafe na-egbochi, silkworm na-akwụ ụgwọ, anụ ụlọ kwụsiri ike, ya. na-esi ike ịchọta ndị mmadụ, ikpe ọha na eze na ịkwaga na-echekwa, ihe onwunwe furu efu siri ike, ọrịa siri ike ịtọlite, ziga n'ili ugwu, gbanwee ya.
第X籤: Lọtrị iri asatọ na atọ na-emeri
